USER QUERY: When I fast‑on (DFON) any Coffee Remote between 07:00 and 09:00 on weekdays, set their backlight to 80%.

__BEGIN_NUCORE_ROUTINE__
{
  "routine": {
    "id": 1001,
    "name": "Weekday morning DFON -> set backlight 80%",
    "parent": 0,
    "comment": "When any remote sends DFON during weekday morning window, set backlight to 80% on all remotes",
    "if": [
      { "(": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "A 2D 3A 2", "control": "DFON" } },
        { "or": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "A 2D 3A 3", "control": "DFON" } },
        { "or": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "A 2D 3A 4", "control": "DFON" } },
      { ")": 1 },
      { "and": 1 },
      { "weekly": { "days": "mon,tue,wed,thu,fri", "from": { "time": "07:00", "to": { "time": "09:00" } } } }
    ],
    "then": [
      { "device": "A 2D 3A 2", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 80, "uom": "51", "precision": 0 } ] },
      { "device": "A 2D 3A 3", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 80, "uom": "51", "precision": 0 } ] },
      { "device": "A 2D 3A 4", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 80, "uom": "51", "precision": 0 } ] }
    ],
    "else": [],
    "reasoning": "Use a grouped COC (DFON) for all three remotes and restrict to weekdays 07:00-09:00. The remotes accept the Backlight (BL) command with UOM 51 (percent); set value 80 with integer precision. Actions apply BL to each remote so the triggered remote and peers get consistent backlight state."
  }
}
__END_NUCORE_ROUTINE__
